chunk_text: Article 2 This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Union. Done at Strasbourg, 12 December 2012. For the European Parliament The President M. SCHULZ For the Council The President A. D. MAVROYIANNIS (1) OJ C 139, 14.6.2006, p. 1. (2) OJ L 406, 30.12.2006, p. 1.
